import { Fragment } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Cart({ cartItems, setCartItems }) { return (

Your Cart: {cartItems.length} items

{cartItems.map((item) => (
{item.product.name}

${item.product.price}

- +
))}

Order Summary

Subtotal: 1 (Units)

Est. total: $245.67

); }
